name: traya-backend-engineering
description: AI-powered backend development workflow with compounding engineering principles. Specialized agents, skills, and commands for building scalable Node.js/NestJS APIs with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, and TypeORM.

Core Development.name: api-designer
Core Development.description: REST and GraphQL API design with industry best practices, OpenAPI specs, and scalable architecture patterns

Core Development.name: nestjs-specialist
Core Development.description: NestJS framework expertise including modules, dependency injection, guards, interceptors, and decorators

Core Development.name: express-specialist
Core Development.description: Express.js development with middleware patterns, routing, and modern best practices

Core Development.name: typescript-reviewer
Core Development.description: TypeScript code review with backend-specific type safety and Node.js conventions

Database & ORM.name: database-modeler
Database & ORM.description: Database design and modeling for PostgreSQL and MongoDB with schema optimization and migration strategies

Database & ORM.name: typeorm-specialist
Database & ORM.description: TypeORM expertise including entities, repositories, migrations, and query optimization

Database & ORM.name: redis-cache-specialist
Database & ORM.description: Redis caching strategies, session management, and performance optimization patterns

API Documentation.name: api-documenter
API Documentation.description: API documentation generation with OpenAPI 3.0, Swagger, AsyncAPI, GraphQL schemas, and Postman collections

Quality & Testing.name: testing-specialist
Quality & Testing.description: Backend testing with Jest, Supertest, integration tests, and E2E testing strategies

Quality & Testing.name: performance-analyzer
Quality & Testing.description: Backend performance analysis including query optimization, memory profiling, and load testing

Quality & Testing.name: security-auditor
Quality & Testing.description: Backend security including authentication, authorization, input validation, and OWASP best practices

Architecture & Strategy.name: architecture-strategist
Architecture & Strategy.description: Backend architecture analysis and design decisions for scalable microservices and monolithic APIs

skills.name: api-developer
skills.description: Complete API development workflow from design to tested endpoints with documentation

skills.name: api-documentation-generator
skills.description: Automated API documentation generation for OpenAPI, Swagger, GraphQL schemas, and Postman collections

skills.name: database-integrator
skills.description: Database integration workflow with TypeORM, migrations, and optimized query patterns

skills.name: api-tester
skills.description: Comprehensive API testing workflow covering unit, integration, and E2E tests with Postman validation

skills.name: code-reviewer
